DescriptionFormatTextId.SourceString: Text_When you hit an enemy, deal an additional <Exec.MagicalDamageBase>[1] #</> that freezes the target causing frostbite: reducing <MoveSpeedMod># by [0]%</> and <ActionSpeed># by [0]%</> for <Duration>[0] seconds</>.
